attributes.action: Put heat exchangers in all council property instead of fossil fuel boilers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to dramatically reduce heating costs all around the country for every household that has them fitted, and to offer grants to other householders to enable them to get them installed to actually do something that is substantially reducing the carbon footprint of this country, instead of trying to tax fossil  fuel usage, when no alternative is offered, you're making money from fossil fuel taxation, plow it into something like this, WHICH WORKS !!! and is practically free heat !!!
